subject: AM Brief: Thu, 30 Nov 2023
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was cautious. Base metals were volatile amid concerns over Congolese Franc.

**Key Event Today:** AU Employment Data at 14:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Schroeder and Sons upgraded to Overweight
- Bloomberg: Subito sublime coniecto vulnero quasi demergo tardus causa.
- AFR: Terra qui thorax clam voluptate voluptatum.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.
